name: Infinite Inferno 3D
description:
There must have been any kind of problem in hell and lava has started falling everywhere. Run and jump through the platforms to scape.

This game is made for mobile devices, but you can also play it in your computer pressing any key as if it were a touch.

IMPORTANT! This is one of my old games. It might not work properly in some devices. Sorry for the inconvenience.
